settings.title: Weatherproofing
settings.text: Provides durable weatherproofing, shielding your roof from the damaging effects of rain, wind, and sunlight.

settings.title: Minimise Blistering and Ageing Effect
settings.text: Minimises blistering and the ageing effect, preserving the integrity and appearance of your roof over time.

settings.title: Durable
settings.text: Offers long-lasting durability, ensuring your roof remains protected and maintains its aesthetic appeal for years to come.

settings.title: Rejuvenation of Your Roof Tiles
settings.text: Restores the appearance of your roof tiles, giving them a rejuvenated look akin to a newly laid roof.

settings.title: Breathable Condensation Preventing Coat
settings.text: Forms a breathable coating that prevents condensation buildup, helping to mitigate moisture-related issues on your roof.

settings.title: Enhanced Protection
settings.text: Provide comprehensive protection for your roof against weather elements, extending its lifespan and reducing maintenance needs.

settings.title: Cost-Effective Restoration
settings.text: Achieve roof restoration without the need for costly replacements, saving you money while revitalising your property's exterior.

settings.title: UV Resistance
settings.text: Benefit from UV-resistant properties that prevent damage from prolonged exposure to sunlight, maintaining the integrity of the roof coating.

settings.title: Improved Energy Efficiency
settings.text: Help improve energy efficiency by reducing heat loss through the roof, leading to potential energy savings over time.

settings.heading: Additives
settings.text: Our paints are fortified with advanced additives, engineered to enhance performance and longevity. From improved adhesion to resistance against moisture and Mould, our formulations are designed to exceed expectations, delivering unparalleled results with every brushstroke.

settings.heading: Pigment
settings.text: Delve into a world of Colour with our exquisite pigments, meticulously selected to create stunning shades and captivating hues. Experience the magic of vibrant Colours that breathe life into any space, transforming ordinary walls into works of art.

settings.heading: Resin
settings.text: Crafted with the utmost care and precision, our paints are more than just a coatingâ€”they're a symbol of excellence. With superior coverage and durability, our formulations set the standard for paint perfection, ensuring a flawless finish that endures the test of time.

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.text: PUREWORLD paints are dedicated to environmental preservation, offering high-quality products that save water and materials. Our paint is designed to perform exceptionally while also reducing waste and emissions, all at a price that encourages wide adoption.

settings.title: Protective Coating Application
settings.text: Applies a durable, weather-proof coating to the roof surface, providing enhanced protection against the elements.

settings.title: Minimises Blistering
settings.text: Minimises blistering and the ageing effect, preserving the integrity and appearance of the roof tiles.

settings.title: Restores Appearance
settings.text: Restores the appearance of roof tiles, giving them a rejuvenated look comparable to a newly laid roof.

settings.title: Prevents Condensation
settings.text: Forms a breathable coating that prevents condensation buildup, helping to mitigate moisture-related issues on the roof.

settings.title: Durable Weatherproofing
settings.text: Provides long-lasting weatherproofing, shielding the roof from rain, wind, and sunlight to maintain its durability over time.

settings.title: UV Resistance
settings.text: Offers UV-resistant properties to prevent damage from prolonged exposure to sunlight, ensuring the longevity of the roof coating.

settings.title: Easy Application
settings.text: Facilitates easy application with a water-based formula that adheres well to various roofing materials, making it suitable for DIY use.

settings.title: Cost-Effective Solution
settings.text: Provides a cost-effective solution for roof restoration, eliminating the need for costly replacements while extending the lifespan of the roof.

settings.heading: PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

Sustainability Meets Innovation

settings.heading: Water Saving Technology
settings.text: Pure World Paints is at the forefront of sustainable practices, featuring our exclusive technology that dramatically reduces water usage in manufacturing, setting new standards for eco-friendly paint production.

settings.heading: Environmental Impact
settings.text: Every can of Pure World Paints represents a significant environmental savings, preserving precious fresh water for our ecosystem and contributing to the well-being of natural water reserves.

settings.heading: Secret to Sustainability
settings.text: Water saving technologies, developed by Thermilate Technologies, remains our closely guarded secret, symbolising our commitment to advanced, sustainable solutions in the coatings industry
Premium Quality, Eco-Friendly Promise

settings.heading: Industry-Leading Quality
settings.text: Pure World Paints doesn't compromise on quality. Our paints are revered for their superior finish, ensuring that eco-friendly also means premium performance.

settings.heading: Comprehensive Range
settings.text: Offering a full spectrum of interior and exterior paints, we've ensured that every painting need is met with an option that aligns with your sustainability goals.

settings.heading: Consumer Satisfaction
settings.text: Our commitment to customer satisfaction is as strong as our dedication to the environment, with solutions tailored to meet specific needs across the globe, from the UK to Dubai.
The Pure World Difference

settings.heading: Cost-Effective Solutions
settings.text: Embrace the Pure World advantage, where high-quality meets cost-efficiency. Our water-saving paints not only benefit the planet but also provide financial savings in production energy.

settings.heading: Global Reach and Reliability
settings.text: Pure World Paints is globally Recognised, with a trusted presence in over 20 countries, assuring that wherever you are, our eco-innovative solutions are within reach.

settings.heading: Lasting Impression
settings.text: Let your space make more than a good impression; let it make a lasting, eco-conscious statement. Pure World Paints invites you to be a part of the movement towards a more sustainable future.

settings.heading: Pure World Paints Eco-Excellence in Every Stroke
settings.text: Pure World Paints stands as a beacon of eco-friendly excellence in the painting industry. Our groundbreaking approach ensures that with every application, you're not just beautifying your space, but also participating in a global movement towards water conservation. It's a paint that's conscious of its footprint, offering you a sustainable choice without compromising on quality. Pure World Paints the only genuine brand contribute to a greener planet while delivering a pristine paint job that conserves water and energy in its manufacture.

HQC Anti Condensation coating is the perfect answer for applications requiring long-lasting protection from continuous and severe condensation. Use in kitchens and bathrooms in homes, hotels, schools, universities, restaurants, service stations, gyms, swimming pools and spas. Paint can easily be applied by brush, roller or spray.
